verbs.description: [ARG1: U.S. stocks] [V: held] [ARG2: steady] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump lashed out at U.S. allies Canada and Europe on trade issues at the G-7 meeting over the weekend] .

U.S. stocks held steady Monday after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: lashed] out [ARG1: at U.S. allies Canada and Europe] [ARGM-ADV: on trade issues] [ARGM-LOC: at the G-7 meeting] [ARGM-TMP: over the weekend] .
